data.name: Pit Stoppers
data.detailed_description:
Car races are so chaotically fun, right? But what happens behind the scenes can be even more chaotic when it's just you and your crewmates against time and physics.

Pit Stoppers is a couch co-op game for 1-4 players focused on the task of maintaining racing cars as quickly as possible. It is a game about racing, but here the real race is the one in the pit, where you and your pit stop crew work as a team to compete against time and random events that happen during the game.

A VARIETY OF RACES

Some races are designed for formula cars, motorcycles, or even rally cars. Right before any of these vehicles enter the pit, you and your teammates receive information on which elements should be fixed. Depending on which vehicle you have to fix, you can change tires and other vehicle parts, refuel, cool down or heat up the engine, give pep talk to the driver, and many other things.

TRAVEL AROUND THE WORLD

In the game you can go to ten different locations scattered around Europe, each with its own specific obstacles and challenges. Fight against the flood in the rainy North, jump over fancy yachts in the south and find ways to keep your drivers awake during lengthy whole-day races.

EASY TOOLS, LOTS OF FUN
As the controls for each player are always visible and simple (players can either pick up, throw or use tools), anyone can join in on the fun. However, to achieve the biggest award in every location, players must sharpen their communication and coordination skills to control the pit stop chaos as quickly as possible.

data.short_description: Fix racing cars with your crewmates in this local co-op game for up to 4 players. Work as quickly as possible, but make sure to do it right since each stop can turn into chaos pretty easily. Travel around the land to see what fun little mishaps each race location has to offer. Ready, steady, go!

Minimum:

  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
